**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** gandhasya lakṣaṇam
āha---karambho miśra-gandhaḥ, yathā vyañjanādīnāṁ hiṅgv-ādi-saṁskāre \|
pūtir durgandhaḥ\|\|45\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.46 \|\|**

**bhāvanaṁ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṁ dhāraṇaṁ sad-viśeṣaṇam \|**

**sarva-sattva-guṇodbhedaḥ pṛthivī-vṛtti-lakṣaṇam \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** bhāvanam utpādakatvam
\|brahma-sthānaṁ tu pṛthivī śarīre brahma-darśanāt iti kāpileye \|
sad-viśeṣeṇa vyaktatvam \|asad-avyakta-nāma syād vyaktaṁ sad iti cocyate
iti brāhme \| sarva-sattva-guṇodbhedaḥ śarīre hi sarva-prāṇināṁ guṇā
vyajyante saṁsārāvasthāyām \|

> śarīraṁ pārthivaṁ jñeyam indriyy audakāni tu \|
>
> taijasaḥ koṣṭhago vahniś chidram ākāśa-sambhavam \|
>
> prāṇā vāyumayāḥ sarve pratyekaṁ pañcadhā punaḥ \|\| iti kāpileye
> \|\|46\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** brahmaṇo bhāvanaṁ
pratimādi-rūpeṇa sākāratāpādanam \| sthānaṁ
jalādi-vilakṣaṇatayāśrayāntara-nairapekṣyeṇa sthitiḥ \| dhāraṇaṁ
jalādy-ādhāratvam \| satām ākāśādīnāṁ viśeṣaṇam avacchedakatvam \|
sarveṣāṁ sattvānāṁ prāṇināṁ tad-guṇānāṁ ca puṁstvādīnām udbhedaḥ pariṇām
aviśeṣaiḥ prakaṭī-karaṇam \|\|46\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** bhāvanam iti \| brahmaṇaḥ
parameśvarasya tasya bhāvanam indranīlādi-rūpāyās tasyā
rūpādi-dṛṣṭāntatvena smaraṇa-hetutvaṁ jalādau gandhādy-abhāvāt
asamyaktvam iti \| yad vā, virāḍ-rūpeṇa tasya bhāvanaṁ bhāvanopādhitvam
\|\|46\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** pṛthivyā lakṣaṇam
āha---brahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasya bhāvanaṁ pratimā-nirmāṇa-kāraṇatvam \|
sthānaṁ jalādi-vilakṣaṇatayā nairapekṣyeṇa sthitiḥ \| dhāraṇaṁ
jalādyodhāratvam \| satyam ākāśādīnāṁ viśeṣaṇam \| viśeṣaṇa-hetuḥ
malinam ākāśaṁ dhūsaro'nilaḥ ity-ādi-pratītir yata ity arthaḥ \|
sarveṣāṁ sattvānāṁ prāṇināṁ tad-guṇānāṁ ca puṁstvādīnām udbhedaḥ
pariṇāma-viśeṣaiḥ prakaṭī-karaṇam \|\|46\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.47 \|\|**

**nabho-guṇa-viśeṣo'rtho yasya tac chrotram ucyate \|**

**vāyor guṇa-viśeṣo'rtho yasya tat sparśanaṁ viduḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** śrotrādīnāṁ śabdādi-grāhakatvam
uktaṁ teṣāṁ ca lakṣaṇaṁ tad evety āha pañcabhiḥ ślokārdhaiḥ \| nabhaso
guṇa-viśeṣaḥ śabdo yasyārtho viṣayaḥ \|\|47\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** śrotrādīnāṁ
śabdādi-grāhakatvam uktam \| teṣāṁ ca lakṣaṇaṁ tad evety āha---nabhaso
guṇa-viśeṣaḥ \| śabdo yasyārtho viṣayas tat śrotram \|\|47\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.48 \|\|**

**tejo-guṇa-viśeṣo'rtho yasya tac cakṣur ucyate \|**

**ambho-guṇa-viśeṣo'rtho yasya tad rasanaṁ viduḥ \|**

**bhūmer guṇa-viśeṣo'rtho yasya sa ghrāṇa ucyate \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam**.***

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tejasa iti sārdhakam \|\|48\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.49 \|\|**

**parasya dṛśyate dharmo hy aparasmin samanvayāt \|**

**ato viśeṣo bhāvānāṁ bhūmāv evopalakṣyate \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** guṇa-viśeṣa-śabda-vyāvartyaṁ
darśayati---parasyeti \| parasya kāraṇasya dharmaḥ śabdādir aparasmin
kārye vāyv-ādau kāraṇānvayāt dṛśyate \| ato bhāvānām akāśādīnāṁ viśeṣo
guṇaḥ sarvo'pi śabdādir bhūmāv evopalabhyate \| caturṇāṁ tatrānvayāt \|
jalādiṣu yathānvayam eva na sarvaḥ \| ākāśe tv anyānvayābhāvād eka eva
\|\|49\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kiṁ ca---pañcasu bhūteṣu
madhye yathottaraṁ guṇādhikyam āha---parasya kāraṇasya dharmaḥ śabdādiḥ
\| aparasmin kārye vāyv-ādau kāraṇānvayād dṛśyate \|
tatrākāśe'nyānvayābhāvād eka eva śabdaḥ \| vāyau dvau śabda-sparśau \|
tejasi trīṇi śabda-sparśa-rūpāṇi \| jale catvāraḥ
śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasāḥ \|\|49\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.50 \|\|**

**etāny asaṁhatya yadā mahad-ādīni sapta vai \|**

**kāla-karma-guṇopeto jagad-ādir upāviśat \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** evaṁ kāraṇotpattim uktvā
kāryotpattim āha sārdhais tribhiḥ \| etāny asaṁhatya amilitvā yadā
sthitāni tadā jagad-ādir īśvaraḥ prāviśat \| sapteti ca
prādhānyābhiprāyeṇoktam \| praveśas tu sarveṣv api vivakṣita eva
\|\|50\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** etānīti \| adhunā kālādi-viśeṣair
upeta iti jñeyam \|\|50\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** evaṁ kāraṇotpattim uktvā
kāryotpattim āha---etāni tattvāni asaṁhatya amilitvā yadā sthitāni tadā
jagad-ādir īśvaraḥ prāviśat \| prathamaṁ saṁhanana-kāriṇyā śaktyā
sarva-tattva-sammelanārtham āviśat \| tato varṣa-sahasrānte
tad-antaryāmitvena prāviśad iti jñeyam \| kālaḥ kṣobhakaḥ karma
jīvādṛṣṭaṁ guṇaḥ prakṛtis taiḥ sahitaḥ \| sapteti ca
prādhānyābhiprāyeṇoktam \| praveśas tu sarveṣv api vivakṣitaḥ \|\|50\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.51 \|\|**

**tatas tenānuviddhebhyo yuktebhyo'ṇḍam acetanam \|**

**utthitaṁ puruṣo yasmād udatiṣṭhad asau virāṭ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** anuviddhebhyaḥ kṣubhitebhyaḥ \|
asmād aṇḍād asau virāṭ puruṣa udatiṣṭhat \|\|51\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** utthitam utpannaṁ virāṭ puruṣo
hiraṇyagarbhātmakaḥ samaṣṭi-jīvaḥ udatiṣṭhat suṣuptam ivātikramaya
sa-cetano babhuva \|\|51\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tenatat-praveśena
anuviddhebhya ādau kṣubhitebhyas tat-kṣaṇād eva yuktebhyo militebhyas
tattvebhyo'ṇḍam utthitam utpannam \|yasmād virāṭ puruṣo
hiraṇyagarbhātmakaḥ samaṣṭi-jīva udatiṣṭhat nidrām ivātikramya sa-cetano
babhūva \|\|51\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.52 \|\|**

**etad aṇḍaṁ viśeṣākhyaṁ krama-vṛddhair daśottaraiḥ \|**

**toyādibhiḥ parivṛtaṁ pradhānenāvṛtair bahiḥ \|**

**yatra loka-vitāno'yaṁ rūpaṁ bhagavato hareḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhagavato rūpam iti
puruṣābhedābhiprāyeṇa \|\|52\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** abhyutthitāḥ
sva-svādhiṣṭhāna-saṁyogaṁ prāptā api asya virājaḥ \| utthāpane bahiś
ceṣṭā-sampādane āviviśuḥ prayatnaṁ cakruḥ \|\|52\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** aṇḍam iti \| viśeṣa ity
ākhyā nāma yasya tat \| daśa-guṇādhikair uttarottaraiḥ
bahiḥ-sthita-prakṛtyāvaraṇenāvṛtaiḥ \| rūpaṁ māyikam \|\|52\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.53 \|\|**

**hiraṇmayād aṇḍa-kośād utthāya salile śayāt \|**

**tam āviśya mahā-devo bahudhā nirbibheda kham \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

acetanād yatas tv aṇḍād brahmā samajani sphuṭam \|

> ato brahmāṇḍam ity āhur virāḍ brahmā prakāśanāt \|\| iti ca \|\|53\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tasminn adhyātmādi-vibhāgam
āha---hiraṇmayād iti navabhiḥ \| utthāyaudāsīnyaṁ vihāya tam
āviśyādhiṣṭhāya \| mahāṁś cāsau devaś ca \| khaṁ chidram \|\|53\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** kham ākāśaṁ bahudhā nirbibheda
pṛthak pṛthak kṛtavān \|\|53\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tasminn
adhyātmādi-vibhāgam āha---hiraṇmayād iti \| āviśya ādhiṣṭhāya mahāṁś
cāsau devaś ca bahu-vidhaṁ khaṁ chidraṁ nirvibheda pṛthak pṛthak cakāra
\|\|53\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.54 \|\|**

**nirabhidyatāsya prathamaṁ mukhaṁ vāṇī tato'bhavat \|**

**vāṇyā vahnir atho nāse prāṇoto ghrāṇa etayoḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** vāṇyā saha vahnir abhavat
prāviśat \| nāse nirabhidyetām \| prāṇotaḥ prāṇena ūtaḥ syūtaḥ san
ghrāṇa etayor nāsikayor abhavad ity anuṣaṅgaḥ \|\|54\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** mukhaṁ vyaṣṭi-mukhānāṁ kāraṇāṁśam
eva vāṇyapi \|\|54\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** vāṇyā saha vahnir abhavat
prāviśat \| nāse nirabhidyotāṁ prāṇotaḥ prāṇen a syūtaḥ san prāṇaḥ \|
etayor nāsayor abhavad ity anuṣaṅgaḥ prāṇota iti viśeṣaṇaṁ sarvendriyeṣu
liṅga-vipariṇāmena draṣṭavyam \|\|54\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.55 \|\|**

**ghrāṇād vāyur abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣur etayoḥ \|**

**tasmāt sūryo nyabhidyetāṁ karṇau śrotraṁ tato diśaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ghrāṇād anantaraṁ vāyuś ca \|
prāṇota iti viśeṣaṇaṁ sarvendriyeṣv api draṣṭavyam \| nyabhidyetām
anvabhidyetām iti pāṭha-dvaye'py eka evārthaḥ \| tato diśaḥ prāviśan
\|\|55\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ghrāṇād anantaraṁ vāyur
āviśat \| evam evāgre'pi pañcamy-antānāṁ tad-anantaram iti vyākhyā jñeyā
\| sūryo'nubhidyetāṁ nyabhidyetām iti pāṭha-dvayam \|\|55\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.56 \|\|**

**nirbibheda virājas tvag- roma-śmaśrv-ādayas tataḥ \|**

**tata oṣadhayaś cāsan śiśnaṁ nirbibhide tataḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ādi-śabdena keśāḥ \|\|56\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** oṣadhya āpaś ca
tat-tad-abhimāninyaḥ \|\|56\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam**.***

\...

**\|\| 3.26.57 \|\|**

**retas tasmād āpa āsan nirabhidyata vai gudam \|**

**gudād apāno'pānāc ca mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ \|\|**

*na katamenāpi vyākhyātam.*

\...

**\|\| 3.26.58 \|\|**

**hastau ca nirabhidyetāṁ balaṁ tābhyāṁ tataḥ svarāṭ \|**

**pādau ca nirabhidyetāṁ gatis tābhyāṁ tato hariḥ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

yajña-nāmā tu devo'pi vijñeyaḥ pāda-devatā \|

> tad-āviṣṭo harir nityaṁ tam āhuḥ pāda-daivatam \|
>
> tasyendriyābhimānitvaṁ kutaḥ pūrṇa-malātmanaḥ \|\| iti ca \|\|58\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** svarāḍ indraḥ \| harir viṣṇuḥ
\|\|58\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** haris tad-āveśāvatāro
devatā-viśeṣaḥ \|\|58\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** svarāṭ indraḥ \| hariḥ
hariṇā āviṣṭo deva-viśeṣa iti sandarbhaḥ \|\|58\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.59 \|\|**

**nāḍyo'sya nirabhidyanta tābhyo lohitam ābhṛtam \|**

**nadyas tataḥ samabhavann udaraṁ nirabhidyata \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ābhṛtaṁ jātam \|\|59\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nāḍya ity ardhakam \| lohitaṁ
raktādi-sañcārikā śaktiḥ \|\|59\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **lohitaṁ
raktādi-sañcārikam indriyam ābhṛtaṁ jātam \|\|59\|\|**

\...

**\|\| 3.26.60 \|\|**

**kṣut-pipāse tataḥ syātāṁ samudras tv etayor abhūt \|**

**athāsya hṛdayaṁ bhinnaṁ hṛdayān mana utthitam \|\|**

*na katamena vyākhyātam.*:

\...

**\|\| 3.26.61 \|\|**

**manasaś candramā jāto buddhir buddher girāṁ patiḥ \|**

**ahaṅkāras tato rudraś cittaṁ caityas tato'bhavat \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

caittyo\'pi bhagavān viṣṇur antaryāmī caturmukhāt \|

> svecchayā vyaktim agamat tato\'sau brahmajaḥ smṛtaḥ \|\|61\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** buddhy-ādiṣu hṛdayam
evādhiṣṭhānam \| girāṁ patir brahmā \| caittyaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ \|\|61\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** aham iti \| atra caittyaḥ
kṣetrajño hiraṇyagarbhāntaryāmy-avastha īśvaraḥ pradyumna-rūpo'yaṁ
jñeyaḥ \| jīvasya kartuḥ karaṇatvābhāvād devatātvābhāvāc ca
īśvara-puruṣa-gatatvenaiva praśnottarābhyāṁ ca \| ato'syaiva
sarvādhika-sāmarthyaṁ darśayiṣyate cittenety ādinā \|\|61\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** hṛdaya eva mana
ādy-antaḥ-karaṇa-catuṣṭayasyādhiṣṭhānam \| girāṁ patir brahmā \|
caittyaḥ cittādhiṣṭhātā vāsudevaḥ sa eva citte upāsya-devatā ca \| sa
eva samaṣṭi-jīvasya hiraṇyagarbhasya pradyumnatvenāntaryāmī \| sa eva
vyaṣṭi-jīvānām aniruddhatvenāntaryāmīti bhāgavatāmṛtāj jñeyam \| na tu
cittādhiṣṭhātā kṣetrajño jīva iti vācyaḥ \| tasya
kartṛtva-karaṇatvādy-abhāvasya sarvatra pratipāditatvāt \|
ācārya-caittya-vapuṣā sva-gatiṁ vyanakti \[bhā.pu. 11.29.6\]ity ādāv api
caittya-śabdenāntaryāmiṇaṁ tu cittopādhitvād eva, na tu
cittādhiṣṭhātṛtvād iti jñeyam \|\|61\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.62 \|\|**

**ete hy abhyutthitā devā naivāsyotthāpane'śakan \|**

**punar āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayituṁ kramāt \|\|**

**vahnir vācā mukhaṁ bheje nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**ghrāṇena nāsike vāyur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**akṣiṇī cakṣuṣādityo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**tvacaṁ romabhir oṣadhyo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**retasā śiśnam āpas tu nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**gudaṁ mṛtyur apānena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**hastāv indro balenaiva nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**viṣṇur gatyaiva caraṇau nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**nāḍīr nadyo lohitena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**kṣut-tṛḍbhyām udaraṁ sindhur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**hṛdayaṁ manasā candro nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**buddhyā brahmāpi hṛdayaṁ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|**

**rudro'bhimatyā hṛdayaṁ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

yajñānta-sthaḥ svayaṁ-pādau viśan notthāpayat hariḥ \|

> śakto'pi brahma-vāyvos tu balajñeptyai janārdanaḥ \|
>
> tat-stha utthāpayāmāsa brahma-dehaṁ viśan prabhuḥ \|\|67\|\|

brahmā bṛhaspatiḥ \| yasmin brahmā rājani pūrva etīti śrutiḥ \|
bṛhaspatiḥ purodhāś ca brahmā ca brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ ity abhidhānam
\|\|69\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** anvaya-vyatirekābhyāṁ
kṣetra-jñaṁ vivektuṁ sarveṣāṁ punaḥ praveśam āha---eta iti navabhiḥ
\|\|62-70\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** abhyutthitāḥ
sva-svādhiṣṭhāna-saṁyogaṁ prāptā api asya virājaḥ \| utthāpane
bahiś-ceṣṭā-sampādane āviviśuḥ prayatnaṁ cakruḥ \|\|62\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** anvaya-vyatirekābhyām
antaryāmina eva sarva-śaktimattvaṁ darśayitum uktam eva praveśaṁ
sarveṣām eva punar āha---eta ity-ādinā \|\|62-69\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.70 \|\|**

**cittena hṛdayaṁ caityaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ prāviśad yadā \|**

**virāṭ tadaiva puruṣaḥ salilād udatiṣṭhata \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

aṁśena supto brahmāpi aṁśena niragāt tathā \|

> sva-dehād vāyu-sahito viṣṇunā ca jagat-prabhuḥ \|\|
>
> tam utthāpayituṁ devās tān ṛte trīn mahābalān \|
>
> nāśaknuvas tv eka-saṁsthās tatas teṣv aviśaṁs trayaḥ \|\|
>
> udatiṣṭhad brahma-dehas tadā teṣāṁ prabhāvataḥ \|
>
> viśeṣeṇa harer eva prabhāvena śriyaḥ pateḥ \|\|
>
> cittābhimānī brahmaiva kṣetrajñas tad-gato hariḥ \|
>
> prāṇa-vāyur iti proktas tayor īśo hariḥ svayam \|\|70\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam**.***

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** citteneti \| prāviśat
bahiś-ceṣṭā-sampādanārthaṁ svayam eva sarvotthāpane punar udyamaṁ
kṛtavān \| udatiṣṭhat bahir api ceṣṭāṁ prāptavān \|\|70\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** caittyo vāsudevaḥ sa eva
kṣetrajño'ntaryāmī \| kṣetrajñaṁ cāpi māṁ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣv
avasthitaḥ \[gītā 13.2\] iti gītokteḥ \|\|70\|\|

**\|\| 3.26.71 \|\|**

**yathā prasuptaṁ puruṣaṁ prāṇendriya-mano-dhiyaḥ \|**

**prabhavanti vinā yena notthāpayitum ojasā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** virāḍadehasya vyaṣṭi-dehaṁ
dṛṣṭāntatvena darśayan sāṅkhyānukathanasya *prayojana*m āha---yatheti
dvābhyām \|\|71\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yatheti yugmakena tathā yena vinā
virāṭ nodatiṣṭhat, tam iti dvābhyām anvayaḥ \| pratyag-ātmānam
antaryāmiṇam \|\|71\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** samaṣṭi-virāḍ-dehasya
vyaṣṭi-dehaṁ dṛṣṭāntayati yatheti \| yena cittādhiṣṭhātrā parameśvareṇa
vinā prasuptaṁ vyaṣṭiṁ yathā utthāpayituṁ na śaknuvanti, tathaiva yena
vinā samaṣṭi-virāḍ api nodatiṣṭhad iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ \|\|71\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.26.72 \|\|**

**tam asmin pratyag-ātmānaṁ dhiyā yoga-pravṛttayā \|**

**bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicyātmani cintayet \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** prathamaṁ parameśvare bhaktis
tato'nyatra viraktis tato yoga-pravṛttā dhīḥ ekāgraṁ cittaṁ tato yaj
jñānaṁ tena pratyag ātmānaṁ kṣetra-jñam asminn ātmani
kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāte vivicya cintayet \|\|72\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** saṅkhyānukathanasya
prayojanam āha---taṁ pratyag-ātmānaṁ pratyag-jñāna-gamyam asmin
kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāte ātmani dehe jīvātmany eva vā cintayet \|\|72\|\|

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām \|

ṣaḍviṁśo'yaṁ tṛtīye'smin saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām \|\|\*\|\|

\...

> iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ
> saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ daśama-skandhe
>
> vidura-maitreya-saṁvāde kāpileye
>
> tattva-samāmnāyo nāma ṣaḍviṁśo'dhyāyaḥ \|

\|\| 3.26 \|\|

**...**

**(3.27)**

**atha saptaviṁśo'dhyāyaḥ**

**prakṛtipuruṣayorvivekadvārā mokṣaprāptivarṇanaṁ bhaktiyogena
prakṛtestirodhāna-kathanaṁ ca \|**

**\|\| 3.27.1 \|\|**

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca---**

> **prakṛti-stho'pi puruṣo nājyate prākṛtair guṇaiḥ \|**
>
> **avikārād akartṛtvān nirguṇatvāj jalārkavat \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

sapta-viṁśe tataḥ samyag bahu-sādhana-yogataḥ \|

puṁ-prakṛtyor vivekena mokṣa-rītir nirūpyate \|\|

viveka-jñānena mokṣam upapādayituṁ śuddhasyaiva puruṣasya
prakṛty-avivekataḥ pūrvoktaṁ saṁsāram anusmārayati---prakṛti-stho'pīti
tribhiḥ \| deha-stho'pi nājyate na lipyate \| guṇais tat kṛtaiḥ
sukha-duḥkhādibhiḥ \| nirguṇatvād akartṛtvaṁ tato'vikāritvaṁ tasmāt
\|\|1\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atha jīvākhyaṁ puruṣam api
prakṛter vivinakti \| prakṛti-stho'pīty ādinā yathā jale dṛṣṭo'py arkas
tena na lipyate tathety arthaḥ \|\|1\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

saptaviṁśe bhakti-miśra-jñāna-sādhana-vistṛte \|

puṁ-prakṛtyor vivekāc ca mokṣa-rītir udīryate \|\|

viveka-jñānena mokṣam upapādayituṁ jīvātmānaṁ prakṛter viviktena
darśayati---prakṛti-stho'pi puruṣo jīvaḥ suṣupti-pralayayor nirguṇatvād
akartṛtvam, tato'vikāritvaṁ tasmād dhetor nājyate \| jalārkavat
jalasthaḥ sūrya-maṇḍala-kiraṇa iva, na vastuto jala-dharmākrāntaḥ \|
yadā hi pavana-nibandhano jalasya kampaḥ syāt, tadā tad-anugatasya
jalārkasyāpi kampaḥ syāt \| yad uktaṁ---jyotir yathaivodaka-pārthiveṣv
adaḥ samīra-vegānugataṁ vibhāvyate \[bhā.pu. 10.1.43\] iti \| ata eva
manasaḥ samyak śuddhau satyāṁ tvaṁ-padārtho'pi śuddhyatīti \| mana eva
manuṣyāṇāṁ kāraṇaṁ baddha-mokṣayor \[brahma-bindu 2\][^104] iti śāstram
\|\|1\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.2 \|\|**

> **sa eṣa yarhi prakṛter guṇeṣv abhiviṣajjate \|**
>
> **ahaṅkriyā-vimūḍhātmā kartāsmīty abhimanyate \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam**.***

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** kintv atra jalārka-dṛṣṭāntatvena
darṣaṇa-mukha-dṛṣṭānto lakṣas tasmāt sva-mukhasya
darpaṇa-doṣa-liptatvavat tal-liptatvena mithyaivābhimānaṁ kurute ity
āha---sa iti \| bhakti-yogeneti \|\|2\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tasyābhimāna-nibandhana
eva saṁsāra ity āha---sa eveti dvābhyām \| yarhi jāgara-svapnayoḥ
\|\|2\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.3 \|\|**

> **tena saṁsāra-padavīm avaśo'bhyety anirvṛtaḥ \|**
>
> **prāsaṅgikaiḥ karma-doṣaiḥ sad-asan-miśra-yoniṣu \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** anirvṛtaḥ san \| prāsaṅgikaiḥ
prakṛti-saṅga-kṛtaiḥ \| sad-asan-miśra-yoniṣu deva-tiryaṅ narādiṣu
saṁsāra-padavīṁ prāpnoti \|\|3\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** prāsaṅgikaiḥ
prakṛti-prasaṅga-bhavaiḥ \|\|3\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.4 \|\|**

> **arthe hy avidyamāne'pi saṁsṛtir na nivartate \|**
>
> **dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne'narthāgamo yathā \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** ajñānaṁ supti-śabdoktaṁ svapnaś
caiva viparyayaḥ iti bhārate \|\|4\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nanu tarhy avāstavatvāt
saṁsṛteḥ, kiṁ tan nivṛtti-prayāsena ? tatrāha---arthe hīti \|\|4\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu tasya jīvasya
kartṛtva-kāraṇatvādy-abhāvād vastutaḥ karmābhāve'pi deha-kṛtaiḥ
karmabhiḥ kathaṁ bandhaḥ ? tatrāha---arthe karma-rūpe vastuni
vastuto'vidyamāne'pi kartṛtvābhimānena viṣayān dhyāyataḥ \| tatra
dṛṣṭāntaḥ---svapne khalv anarthasyāpy adhigamaḥ
sābhimāna-viṣaya-dhyāna-paripākād evety arthaḥ \|\|4\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.5 \|\|**

> **ata eva śanaiś cittaṁ prasaktam asatāṁ pathi \|**
>
> **bhakti-yogena tīvreṇa viraktyā ca nayed vaśam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yato viṣaya-dhyānam artha-hetuḥ,
ato mano niyantavyam ity āha---ata eveti \| asatām indriyāṇāṁ pathi
viṣaya-mārge \| tīvrena dṛḍhena \| viraktyā ca tīvrayā \|\|5\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tasya sādhanatvam uktvā
phalāntara-tātparyatvāt sa-kaitavatvaṁ darśitam \|\|5\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yato viṣaya-dhyānam
anartha-hetuḥ, ato mano niyantavyam ity āha---ata eveti \| bhaktiś ca
yogaś ca tayor dvandvaikyaṁ tena, tīvrena baliṣṭhena \|\|5\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.6 \|\|**

> **yamādibhir yoga-pathair abhyasyan śraddhayānvitaḥ \|**
>
> **mayi bhāvena satyena mat-kathā-śravaṇena ca \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhakti-viraktyos tīvratve
kāraṇāni varṇayan jñānena mokṣa-prakāram āha ṣaḍbhiḥ \| yamādibhir
yoga-mārgaiś cittam abhyasan punaḥ punar ekāgrī-kurvann ātmānam
upalabhya sarvānusyūtam advayaṁ paramātmānaṁ pratipadyata iti
ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ \| satyena niṣkapaṭena \| bhāvena premṇā \|\|6\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** ata eva jñāna-karma-miśratvam
āha---yamādīti ṣaṭkena \| bhāvena bhaktyā \| satyena
yathārtha-vyavahāreṇa \| tad evaṁ siddhaṁ jīvasya śuddhatva-jñānam
īśvaropalabdhārthatvena yojayati \|\|6\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** uktam arthaṁ prapañcayan
jñānena mokṣa-prakāram āha---yamādibhir yoga-pathaiḥ abhyasyan abhyāsena
cittam ekāgrīkurvan jīvātmā paramātmānam upalabhya sarvānusyūtam advayaṁ
taṁ pratipadyata iti ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ \| mayi satyena bhāvena
mad-rūpa-nāma-līlādīnāṁ satyatva-dṛṣṭyā mayi yaḥ satyo bhāvaḥ
satyatva-bhāvanā tena, na tu māyā-śavalita-brahmatva-dṛṣṭyā mayy āyatyām
asatyatva-bhāvanayety arthaḥ \| tathātve---

> tvayy asta-bhāvād aviśuddha-buddhayaḥ
>
> āruhya kṛcchreṇa paraṁ padaṁ tataḥ
>
> patanty adho'nādṛta-yuṣmad-aṅghrayaḥ \|\| \[bhā.pu. 10.2.32\] iti,

naiṣkarmyam apy acyuta-bhāva-varjitaṁ \[bhā.pu. 12.12.50\] iti,
avajānanti māṁ mūḍhā mānuṣīṁ tanum āśritaṁ \[gītā 9.11\] iti, na
bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ \[bhā.pu. 11.5.33\]
ity-ādibhyo bhagavad-vigrahādau
cid-ānanda-bhinnatva-bhāvanā-lakṣaṇāvajñayā jñāninām apī
mokṣābhāvāvagateḥ \|\|6\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.7 \|\|**

> **sarva-bhūta-samatvena nirvaireṇāprasaṅgataḥ \|**
>
> **brahmacaryeṇa maunena sva-dharmeṇa balīyasā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** aprasaṅgataḥ saṅga-tyāgena \|
balīyasā īśvare'rpitena \|\|7\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** balīyasā īśvarārpitena
\|\|7\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.8 \|\|**

> **yadṛcchayopalabdhena santuṣṭo mita-bhuṅ muniḥ \|**
>
> **vivikta-śaraṇaḥ śānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** vivikta-śaraṇa ekānta-vāsī
\|\|8\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** vivikta-śaraṇaḥ
ekānta-vāsī, ātmavān dhṛti-yuktaḥ \|\|9\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.9 \|\|**

> **sānubandhe ca dehe'sminn akurvann asad-āgraham \|**
>
> **jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** asad-āgraham ahaṁ-mamatām \| prakṛteḥ puruṣasya
ca dṛṣṭaṁ tattvaṁ yena, tena jñānena \|\|9\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

\...

**\|\| 3.27.10 \|\|**

> **nivṛtta-buddhy-avasthāno dūrī-bhūtānya-darśanaḥ \|**
>
> **upalabhyātmanātmānaṁ cakṣuṣevārkam ātma-dṛk \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** buddher avasthānaṁ hi nidrādi
\|\|10\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nivṛttāni buddhy-avasthānāni
jāgrad-ādīni yasya saḥ \| ata eva dūrī-bhūtam anya-darśanaṁ yasya \|
ātmanāhaṅkārāvacchinnenātmānaṁ śuddham upalabhya \|
ekasyaivāvacchedānavacchedābhyāṁ karaṇa-karmatve dṛṣṭāntam āha---cakṣuṣā
cakṣur-avacchinnenārkeṇa gagana-stham arkam iva \| evam ātma-dṛk śuddham
ātmānaṁ paśyan \|\|10\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** upalabhyeti sārdhakena \| asati
aupādhike'haṅkāre ātmanā tadupādhikenaiva dvārabhūtena \|\|10\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nivṛttāni
buddhy-avasthānāni jāgrad-ādīni yasya saḥ \| tataś ca jñānī śuddhena
jīvātmanaiva paramātmānaṁ bhaktyaivānubhūya tam eva prāpnotīty
āha---upalabhyeti \| ātmanā śuddha-jīvena cit-kaṇena ātmānaṁ
paramātmānaṁ pūrṇa-caitanya-nidhim upalabhya bhaktyānubhūya cakṣuṣā
pāṭalādi-doṣa-rahitena jyotiḥ-kaṇena arkaṁ jyotir-nidhim iva \| ātma-dṛk
jñānī pratipadyate prāpnoti \| atra pāṭalādi-doṣa-rahitenāpi cakṣuṣā
yatholūkādir arkaṁ na paśyati, kintu tad-bhinno manuṣyādir evārkaṁ
paśyti, tathaiva śuddhenāpi jīvātmanā bhakti-rahito jñānī paramātmānaṁ
nānubhavati, kintu bhaktimān evānubhavati \| bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ
\[bhā.pu. 11.14.21\] iti,

> bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ \|
>
> tato māṁ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram \|\| \[gītā 11.55\] iti
> bhagavad-ukteḥ \|\|10\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.11 \|\|**

> **mukta-liṅgaṁ sad-ābhāsam asati pratipadyate \|**
>
> **sato bandhum asac-cakṣuḥ sarvānusyūtam advayam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** mukta-liṅgaṁ nirupādhikam asati
mithyā-bhūte'haṅkāre sad-ābhāsaṁ sad-rūpeṇābhāsamānaṁ brahma prāpnoti \|
śuddha-jīva-svarūpād viśeṣam āha---sataḥ kāraṇasya pradhānasya bandhum
adhiṣṭhānam \| asataḥ kāryasya cakṣur iva prakāśakam \| sarveṣu
kārya-kāraṇeṣv anusyūtam \| advayaṁ paripūrṇam \|\|11\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** mukta-liṅgam upādhi-sparśa-śūnyam
\| ata eva sad-rūpeṇa ā samyak bhāsamānam ātmānam upalabhya tatas
tasyāpi bhāsanādy-upakārakatayā tatraiva sthitaṁ paramātmānam api
pratipadyate jānāti \| tam eva viśinaṣṭi---asatāṁ tad anyeṣām api cakṣur
bhāsakaṁ sarvatra sati asati ca anusyūtam \| ata evādvayaṁ tato
mukhyatvāt tad upalabdhārtham eva śuddhātma-darśanam iti bhāvaḥ \|
anyārthaś ca parāmarśaḥ iti nyāyena \|\|11\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** taṁ kīdṛśam ? muktair
liṅgyate jñāyate iti tam ity anenānubhava-jñāna-viṣayī-bhūtatvaṁ
tasyoktam \| asati naśvare jagati sad eva bhāsate'ntaryāmitveneti tam \|
sataḥ kāraṇasya bandhuṁ patim asataḥ kāryasya mahad-ādeś cakṣur iva
prakāśakaṁ sarveṣu kārya-kāraṇeṣv anusyūtaṁ paripūrṇam advayam ekam iti
viśeṣaṇa-pañcakenānubhava-jñāna-pūrva-daśāyāṁ tasya
śāstrottha-jñāna-viṣayī-bhūtatvaṁ jñāpitam \|\|11\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.12-13 \|\|**

> **yathā jala-stha ābhāsaḥ sthala-sthenāvadṛśyate \|**
>
> **svābhāsena tathā sūryo jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ \|\|**
>
> **evaṁ trivṛd-ahaṅkāro bhūtendriya-manomayaiḥ \|**
>
> **svābhāsair lakṣito'nena sad-ābhāsena satya-dṛk \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

śeṣasya pratibimbās tu devāḥ śeṣas tu brahmaṇaḥ \|

> sa para-brahmaṇaś caiva te sva-bimba-pradarśakāḥ \|
>
> tataḥ sva-bimba-dvāreṇa paramātma-pradarśanam \|\| iti brahma-tarke
> \|\|13\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ahaṅkāropahitena
śuddha-brahma-pratipattiṁ sadṛṣṭāntam āha---yatheti \| jale sthita
ābhāsaḥ sūrya-pratibimbo yadā gṛhāntarvarti-bhittau sphurati tadā
gṛha-koṇa-sthitaiḥ puruṣair bhitty-ādau sthale sthitena svābhāsena
sūrya-pratibimbena yathā prathamaṁ jala-stha ābhāso'vadṛśyate lakṣyate,
gagana-sthasya gṛha-madhye pratibimbāyogāt \| cārthe tathā-śabdaḥ \|
yathā cety arthaḥ \| yathā ca jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ sūryo lakṣyate
\|\|12\|\|

evaṁ bhūtendriya-mano-mayaiḥ dehendriya-manobhir avacchinnaiḥ svābhāsair
ātma-pratibimbais tri-vṛt tri-guṇo'haṅkāraḥ sato brahmaṇa ābhāso yasmiṁs
tena rūpeṇa lakṣitaḥ \| ahaṅkāra-sthābhāsaṁ vinā viṣayābhāsānutpatteḥ \|
anena cāhaṅkāreṇa sad-ābhāsa-vatā satya-dṛk paramārtha-jñapti-rūpa ātmā
lakṣita ity arthaḥ \|\|13\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** evaṁ svāpna-paramparayā
mūla-darśanaṁ dṛṣṭāntayati---yatheti yugmakena \|\|12\|\|

nigamayati---evam iti\| bhūtādi-mayaiḥ saṅghaṭopādhikaiḥ svābhāsaiḥ
svasyāhaṅkāropādhikasyābhāso yeṣu taiḥ
gṛha-koṇa-sthita-puruṣa-sthānīyaiḥ puruṣais trivṛd-ahaṅkāra
upādhikatvena vartate yasya sa lakṣitaḥ \| tataś ca kramād
anenāhaṅkāropādhikena pāraṁparika-dvāra-bhūtena tathā sad-ābhāsena
śuddhena ca sākṣād-dvāra-bhūtena satya-dṛk paramātmāpi lakṣita ity
arthaḥ \|\|13\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** prathamaṁ jīvātmaiva kena
prakāreṇa jñātavyas tatas tena paramātma cety atra sa-dṛṣṭāntam
āha---yatheti \| jale sthita ābhāsaḥ pratibimbākāro niṣkampaḥ
sūrya-prakāśo yadā gṛhāntarvarti-svaccha-bhitty-ādau sthale sphurati,
tadā gṛha-koṇa-sthitaiḥ puruṣaiḥ prathamaṁ sthalastha ābhāso dṛśyate,
tataś ca kuto'yaṁ prakāśa iti parāmṛṣadbhis tena sthala-sthena
svābhāsena śobhana-sūrya-prakāśena jala-stho niṣkampa ābhāso'vadṛśyate
lakṣyate \| punaś cāyam ābhāsaḥ kuta iti tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa tena
jalasthena svābhāsena śobhana-prakāśena divi sthitaḥ sūryo'vadṛśyate \|
evam eva vivekibhiḥ prathamaṁ bhūtendriya-manāṁsi caitanyavattvāt
paramātma-prakāśavanti dṛśyante \| tataś ca jaḍeṣv eṣu
paramātma-prakāśo'yaṁ kuto'stīti bhūtendriya-mano-mayaiḥ
bhūtendriya-mano-vartibhiḥ svābhāsais trivṛd-ahaṅkāra upādhitvena
vartate yasya sa jīvātmā paramātmanaḥ prakāśa-sambhūtaḥ kiraṇa-rūpo
lakṣitaḥ \| tataś cānena jīvātmanā sad-ābhāsena satā bhaktimatā
prakāśena satya-dṛk satya-jñānānandaḥ paramātma lakṣita upalabdhaḥ
\|\|12-13\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.14 \|\|**

> **bhūta-sūkṣmendriya-mano-buddhy-ādiṣv iha nidrayā \|**
>
> **līneṣv asati yas tatra vinidro nirahaṅkriyaḥ \|\|**
>
> **manyamānas tadātmānam anaṣṭo naṣṭavan mṛṣā \|**
>
> **naṣṭe'haṅkaraṇe draṣṭā naṣṭa-vitta ivāturaḥ \|\|**
>
> **evaṁ pratyavamṛśyāsāv ātmānaṁ pratipadyate \|**
>
> **sāhaṅkārasya dravyasya yo'vasthānam anugrahaḥ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** asati pralaye \| yo vinidraḥ sa
satya-dṛk \| yo'naṣṭo'naṣṭavan nājñāsiṣyam iti manyamānaḥ \| sa āturo
draṣṭṛ-jīvaḥ \| sāhaṅkāraṁ dravyaṁ jīvaḥ tasyāvasthānam anugrāhakaś ca
paramātma \|\|14-16\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** idānīṁ suṣupti-sākṣitvena
śuddhātma-pratipattim anubhavato darśayati tribhiḥ \| bhūtādiṣv asaty
asat-tulye'vyākṛte nidrayā līneṣu satsu yas tatra tadā vinidro
nirahaṅkriyas tam ātmānaṁ pratipadyata iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ \|\|14\|\|

nanu yadi tadā vinidro'sāv asti tarhi jāgrat-svapnayor iva sphuṭaḥ kiṁ
nāvabhāsate tatrāha---pūrvaṁ sa draṣṭāto draṣṭṛtvena sa-vikalpatayā
sphuṭaṁ pratītaḥ \| suṣuptau tu bhūtāder ahaṅkāra-viṣayasya līnatvāt tad
viṣaye'haṅkāre naṣṭe sati svayam anaṣṭo'pi mṛṣaivātmānaṁ naṣṭavan
manyamāno yaḥ \| anyasya nāśe'nyasya naṣṭa-tulyatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
naṣṭa-vitto yathā āturo vivaśaḥ, naṣṭavad bhavatīty arthaḥ \|\|15\|\|

nanu suṣuptau na kiñcid anubhūyate, maivam, "sukham aham asvāpsaṁ na
kiñcid avediṣam" iti viśeṣa-jñānaṁ vinā kevalasyātmanaḥ pratisandhānād
ity āha---evam iti \| nanu pratisandhāne sāhaṅkārasya pratīteḥ kathaṁ
nirahaṅkriyatvaṁ tatrāha---sāhaṅkārasya dravyasya
kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghātasyānugrahaḥ prakāśakaḥ avasthānaṁ ca \|
dravya-viśeṣaṇatayāhaṅkārasyāpi dṛśyatvāc ca tad draṣṭātmā tad
vyatiriktaḥ \| tam ātmānam ity anvayaḥ \|\|16\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** bhūta-sūkṣmeti trikam \| asati
sataḥ śuddha-jīvād itarasmin avyākṛte \|\|14\|\|

sāhaṅkāre sati mām ahaṁ nājñāsiṣam iti suṣupty-anantaram eva
pratisandhānāntare
mama-padokta-bhūta-sūkṣmādi-saṅghāta-lakṣaṇa-dravya-viśeṣaṇatayā tad
ahaṅkārasyāpy anyadā dṛśyatvāpatter ahaṁ-padoktas tad draṣṭātma
tad-vyatirikto yaḥ prakāśakaḥ āśrayaś cety arthaḥ \|\|16\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu arkeṇa cakṣuṣaivārka
ivātmanaiva bhaktimatā jñāninā paramātmanubhūyate iti satyaṁ jānīmaḥ,
kintu cakṣuḥ-śrotrādikam iva taṁ jīvātmānaṁ trivṛd-ahaṅkārāt
pṛthag-bhūtaṁ sākṣād darśayety apekṣāyām āha---bhūteti tribhiḥ \|
bhūtādiṣu asati anabhivyaktatvād asat-tulye pradhāne nidrayā līneṣu
satsu yas tatra tadā vinidro nirahaṅkriyaḥ tam ātmānaṁ jīvaṁ
pratipadyate loko'nubhavatīti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ \|\|14\|\|

nanv alaṁ tarhi yogābhyāsena mano-buddhīndriyādi-laye sati yaḥ
kevalātmānubhavo yogābhyāsa-phala-rūpas taṁ khalu nidraiva kārayatīti,
tatrāha---manyamāna iti \| tadā bhūtādīnām ahaṅkāryāṇām ahaṅkārasya ca
layād ahaṁkaraṇe naṣṭe sati draṣṭā jīvo dṛśyānām abhāvād darśane naṣṭe
sati svayam anaṣṭo'pi ātmānaṁ naṣṭavan mṛṣā manyamāno ya ity
avidyāvantaṁ jīvaṁ suṣuptāv utprekṣate naṣṭa-vitta iva, na tu
naṣṭa-vittāsaktir ity arthaḥ \| ayam arthaḥ---yogābhyāsena
jīvopādhi-bhūtānāṁ tattvānām ātyantike laye saty eva jīvaḥ
svīya-rūpānanda-mayo bhavati, na tu naimittikayoḥ suṣupti-pralayayoḥ \|
yathā vitte naṣṭe satyākiñcanāṁsukhaṁ na bhavati, kintu vittāsaktāv eva
naṣṭāyāṁ satyāṁ, tathaiva jīvasya naiṣkarmyaṁ vinā suṣupti-pralayayor
upādhi-nāśe'pi na svarūpa-prāptir naiṣkarmyaṁ ca bhakti-jñānābhyāṁ vinā
na bhaved iti suṣuptau avidyā-tat-saṁskārāṇāṁ ca vidyamānatvāt
kevalātmānubhavo'py akiñcit-kara iti \|\|15\|\|

nanu suṣuptau na kiñcid anbhūyate \| maivam ahaṁ sukham asvāpsaṁ, na
kiñcid avedayiṣam iti viśeṣa-jñānaṁ vinā kevalasyātmanaḥ pratisandhānād
ity āha---evam iti \| kiṁ ca, sāhaṅkārasya dravyasya
bhūtendriyādi-saṅghātasya dehasya yo'vasthānam āśrayaḥ yam eva
jīvātmānam āśritya ahaṅkārādayo bhogyeṣu viṣayeṣu pravartanta ity arthaḥ
\| tathā ya eva jīvātmā anugrahaḥ
svīya-bhoktṛtva-lakṣaṇa-dharma-pradānād anugrāhya ity arthaḥ \|\|16\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.17 \|\|**

**devahūtir uvāca---**

> **puruṣaṁ prakṛtir brahman na vimuñcati karhicit \|**
>
> **anyonyāpāśrayatvāc ca nityatvād anayoḥ prabho \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhakti-viraktibhyāṁ saty api
viveke prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ paraspara-tyāgābhāvāt katahaṁ muktir iti
pṛcchati, puruṣam iti caturbhiḥ \| puruṣa-vyatirekeṇa prakṛteḥ
svarūpa-lābhābhāvāt prakṛti-vyatirekeṇa puruṣasyābhivyakty-abhāvād ity
anyonyāpāśrayatvān nityatvāc ca puruṣaṁ prakṛtiḥ kadācin na muñcatīty
arthaḥ \|\|17\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** anyo'nyāpāśrayatve'py ekasya
naśvaratve vimuñcatu nāma tac ca nety āha---nityatvād iti \|\|17\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu bhaktair api
jñāna-vyākhyādibhir mokṣo durlabha evety atra yuktim āha---puruṣam iti
\| anyonyeti puruṣaḥ śaktimattvāt viśva-sṛṣṭy-ādi-līlārthaṁ
sva-śaktiṁprakṛtim apy āśrayate \| prakṛtir api śaktitvāt svīyaṁ puruṣam
āśrayata evety arthaḥ \| dvayor ekatarasya naśvaratve vimañcatu nāma,
tac ca nety āha---nityatvād iti \|\|17\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.18 \|\|**

> **yathā gandhasya bhūmeś ca na bhāvo vyatirekataḥ \|**
>
> **apāṁ rasasya ca yathā tathā buddheḥ parasya ca \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** vyatirekābhāva-mātre
dṛṣṭāntaḥ---yathā vyatirekato bhāvaḥ sattā nāsti \| gandhasya kadācid
apakṣaya-darśanād dṛṣṭāntāntaram---apām iti \| buddheḥ prakṛteḥ \|
parasya puruṣasya ca \|\|18\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** vyatirekato bhāvaḥ sattā
nāsti gandhasya kadācid apakṣaya-darśanād dṛṣṭāntāntaram apām iti,
buddheḥ prakṛteḥ parasya puruṣasya \|\|18\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.19 \|\|**

> **akartuḥ karma-bandho'yaṁ puruṣasya yad-āśrayaḥ \|**
>
> **guṇeṣu satsu prakṛteḥ kaivalyaṁ teṣv ataḥ katham \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

nitya-dṛk paramātmasau mṛtavad yo na kiñcana \|

> jānāti jīvaḥ sa jñeyaḥ paramātma tad-ayitvāśrayaḥ \|\| iti
> hari-vaṁśeṣu \|\|19\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tataḥ kim ata āha---akartur iti
\| ye guṇā āśrayo yasya saḥ \| teṣu prakṛter guṇeṣu satsu puruṣasya
kaivalyaṁ katham ? \|\|19\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** akartur iti \| ataḥ pūrvoktād
dhetoḥ \|\|19\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tataḥ kim ata
āha---akartur iti \| ye guṇā āśrayo yasya saḥ \| teṣu prakṛter guṇeṣu
satsu puruṣasya jīvasya, ata eva hetoḥ kathaṁ kaivalyam ? \|\|19\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.27.20 \|\|**

> **kvacit tattvāvamarśena nivṛttaṁ bhayam ulbaṇam \|**
>
> **anivṛtta-nimittatvāt punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ata eva kvacin
nivṛtta-prāyasyāpi saṁsāra-bhayasya punar udbhavo dṛśyata ity
āha---kvacid iti \|\|20\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** anyāśrayatve'pi nabhovad
anyāspṛṣṭatvaṁ puruṣasyeti tattva-vivekaḥ kartavya ity apy akiñcitkaram
ity āha---kvacid iti \| kvacit pāṭhaḥ eṣa eva sarva-sammataḥ \|\|20\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ata eva kvacin
nivṛtta-prāyasyāpi saṁsāra-bhayasyodbhavo dṛśyate ity āha---kvacid iti
\|\|20\|\|

**\|\| 3.27.21-23 \|\|**

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca---**

> **animitta-nimittena sva-dharmeṇāmalātmanā \|**
>
> **tīvrayā mayi bhaktyā ca śruta-sambhṛtayā ciram \|\|**
>
> **jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā \|**
>
> **tapo-yuktena yogena tīvreṇātma-samādhinā \|\|**
>
> **prakṛtiḥ puruṣasyeha dahyamānā tv ahar-niśam \|**
>
> **tiro-bhavitrī śanakair agner yonir ivāraṇiḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** na hi prakṛti-saṁbandha-mātraṁ
bandha-hetuḥ, kintu guṇa-buddhyā tad-āsaktis tan-nivṛttau satyāṁ mokṣo
ghaṭate \| kvacid udbhavas tu sādhana-vaikalyād ity abhipretya
sādhanātiśayaṁ kathayan pariharati tribhiḥ \| nimittaṁ phalam \| tan na
nimittaṁ pravartakaṁ yasmin, tena niṣkāmena dharmeṇa \| amalātmanā
nirmalena manasā \| śrutena kathā-śravaṇena saṁbhṛtayā puṣṭayā
\|\|21\|\| **dahyamānā** abhibhūyamānā **tiro-hitā** bhavati \|\|23\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atrocyate---yadi tad-aviveka eva
pūrvokta-hetus, tadā tattvāvamarśa-mātraṁ tatropayuktaṁ syāt, pūrvaṁ tv
īśvara-vaimukhyam eva \| bhayaṁ dvitīyābhiniveśataḥ syāt\[bhā.pu.
11.2.37\] ity-ādeḥ \| tataḥ sarvatreśvarārādhana-pūrvakatvam evopayuktam
ity upadiṣṭam api nirdhārayati ṣaḍbhiḥ \| atra animitteti trikam \|
jñānaṁ vicāraḥ \| darśanaṁ nirdhāraṇam \| tapaḥ śama-damādi \| yogo
jīvātma-paramātmanor dhyānam, yogaḥ saṁhananopāya-dhyāna-saṅgati-yuktiṣu
iti nānārthavargāt \| dhyānam eva dhyātṛ-dhyeya-viveka-rahitaṁ samādhiḥ
\| agneḥ prābalye sati tan-nirvāpaṇārthaṁ tad-āvirbhāva-kāraṇam
**ara**ṇir yathā janais tato'py **antarhit**ā kriyate \| tathā sāpi māyā
svāṁśena [tatas tato]{.mark} bhavatīti \| atra sarvāsām api siddhīnāṁ
mūlaṁ tac-caraṇārcanam \[bhā.pu. 10.81.19\] ity-uktyā bhakter aṅgitve
aṅgavan nirdeśaḥ teṣāṁ tatra sādhanāntara-sāmānya-dṛṣṭir ity abhiprāyeṇa
\| ata eva teṣāṁ mokṣa-mātra-phalam iti \|\|21\|\|

īśvarasya bhagavac-chakty-aṁśe śaktimataḥ sve mahimni mahima-hetāv
īśvaratve sthitasya prāpta-sphūrter iti jīvasya svarūpa-śaktitvaṁ
darśitam, sa yad ajayā tv ajām \[bhā.pu. 10.87.34\] ity-ādeḥ \|\|23\|\|
\[bhakti-sandarbha 226\*\]

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** he mā**taḥ** ! na
prakṛtir jīvasya bandha-hetuḥ, kintu tadīya-guṇādhyāsa eva \| sa
cāvidyā-kṛta eva, ata evāvidyā-nivṛttau mokṣo ghaṭate \| kvacid
bhayodbhavas tu sādhana-vaikalyād ity abhipretya sādhanātiśayaṁ kathayan
pariharati \| nimittaṁ phalaṁ, tad-abhāvo'nimittam eva \| nimittaṁ
pravartako yatra, tena amalaḥ śuddha ātmā antaḥ-karaṇaṁ yataḥ syāt, tena
\| tīvrayā svabhāvād eva sarvatas tejasvinyā śruta-sambhṛtayā mat-kathā
śravaṇa-paripuṣṭayā \| prakṛti-liṅga-dehaḥ puruṣasya ebhiḥ sādhanair
dahyamānā tirobhavati \| agner iti \| araṇiḥ kāṣṭham \| agnir yathā
kāṣṭhād evotpadya kāṣṭhaṁ dahati, tathaiva jñānaṁ liṅga-dehād utpadya
tam eva dahati \|\|21-23\|\|

**\|\| 3.27.24 \|\|**

> **bhukta-bhogā parityaktā dṛṣṭa-doṣā ca nityaśaḥ \|**
>
> **neśvarasyāśubhaṁ dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** evaṁ ca sati punar udbhavo
nāstīty āha---bhukto bhogo yasyāḥ \| nityaśaḥ sadā dṛṣṭo doṣo yasyāḥ \|
ata eva parityaktā satīśvarasyāparatantrasya sve mahimni sthitasya
svānandaṁ prāptasya \|\|24\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kiṁ cāvaśiṣṭāpi
dahyamānāraṇival liṅga-deha-rūpā prakṛtiḥ khalv evaṁ-bhūtā cen nāpakurua
ity āha---bhutko bhogo bahudhā svarga-narakādir yasyā, ata eva vivekinā
carvitavat tyaktā tad api daivād āpatantī ced dṛṣṭo doṣo yasyā sā \|
īśvarasya nityam evaṁ sad-asad-vivecane bhuktvā parityajane doṣa-darśane
ca samarthasya sve mahimni svīye mahattve gurūpadiṣṭa-sādhu-vartmani
\|\|24\|\|

> **yathā hy apratibuddhasya prasvāpo bahv-anartha-bhṛt \|**
>
> **sa eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** avivekāvasthāyām anartha-hetur
api vivekānantaraṁ na bhavatīti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha---yatheti dvābhyām \|
prasvāpaḥ svapnaḥ bahv-anarthān bibharti puṣṇāti \| pratibuddhasya
saṁskāra-vaśena sphurann api \|\|25\|\|

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** avivekāvasthāyām
anartha-hetur yaḥ, sa khalu viveke sati na tathaivety āha---yatheti
dvābhyām \| prasvāpaḥ svapnaḥ bahv-anarthān vyāghra-sarpādi-daṁśān
bibharti, pratibuddhasya saṁskāra-vaśena sphurann api \|\|25\|\|

**\|\| 3.27.28 \|\|**

> **mad-bhaktaḥ pratibuddhārtho mat-prasādena bhūyasā \|**
>
> **niḥśreyasaṁ sva-saṁsthānaṁ kaivalyākhyaṁ mad-āśrayam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** pratibuddhārtho
viditātma-tattvaḥ \| kaivalyākhyaṁ sva-saṁsthānaṁ dehādi-vyatiriktaṁ
svarūpaṁ mad-āśrayaṁ niḥśreyasaṁ niratiśayānandam \|\|28\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** mad-bhaktas tu
mat-prasāde'ñjasaiva niḥśreyasaṁ prāpnotīty āha---mad-bhakta iti \| yadi
mad-bhakta-saṅgena mad-bhakto bhavati tadaivety arthaḥ \| bhūyasyā
sarvatra balavattarayety arthaḥ \| aham evāśrayo yasya tat tad-uktaṁ
gītāsu \| yo mām avyabhicāreṇety ārabhya, brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāhaṁ
\[gītā 14.27\] iti \|*\|28\|\|*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** sva-saṁsthānaṁ
dehādi-vyatiriktaṁ svarūpaṁ kaivalyākhyaṁ brahma \| aham evāśrayo yasya
tat \| yad uktaṁ---brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāhaṁ \[gītā 14.27\] iti
\|\|28\|\|

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sva-dṛśā** ātma-jñānena **chinnāḥ
saṁśayā** mithyā-jñānāni yasya **liṅgād vinirgame** liṅga-śarīra-nāśe
satīty arthaḥ \|\|29\|\|

śuddhātma-jñānena **liṅgād vinirgame** liṅga-śarīre naṣṭe satīty arthaḥ

**\|\| 3.27.30 \|\|**

> **yadā na yogopacitāsu ceto**
>
> **māyāsu siddhasya viṣajjate'ṅga \|**
>
> **ananya-hetuṣv atha me gatiḥ syād**
>
> **ātyantikī yatra na mṛtyu-hāsaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tadā tv
aṇimādi-siddhayo'ntarāya-rūpā bhavanti \| tāsu **yogenopacitāsu**
samṛddhāsu **na yogād** **anyo hetur** yāsāṁ, tāsu yadā **siddhasya ceto
na viṣajjate** \| **aṅga** ! he mātaḥ ! **atha** tadā **antam**
atikrānto'**tyanto** yo'haṁ, tat-sambandhinī \| **yatra** yasyāṁ gatau
**mṛtyor hāso na** bhavati \| viṣakṭau tu siddho'pi mayā vaśī-kṛta iti
mṛtyor hāso garvo bhavatīty arthaḥ \|\|30\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yadā** mat-prasāde sati \|\|30\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kiṁ
cāṇimādi-siddhi-paryantā vividhā bhogā antarāya-rūpā bhavanti, tāsu yogī
na viṣajjed ity āha---**yadā** yogī **upacitāsu** samṛddhāsu **māyāsu**
vividha-bhogya-vastuṣu **siddhasya ceto na visajjate**, tadā **ātyantikī
gatir** muktiḥ syāt \| māyāsu kīdṛśīṣu ? **na yogād anyo hetur** yāsāṁ,
tāsu \| **yatra** yasyāṁ gatau satyāṁ **mṛtyor hāso** **na** bhavati \|
viṣayāsaktau tu siddho'pi mayā vaśīkṛta iti mṛtyor hāso garvo bhavatīty
arthaḥ \|\|30\|\|

**(3.28)**

**aṣṭāviṁśo'dhyāyaḥ \|**

**sabījayogalakṣaṇaṁ saguṇasya bhagavataḥ pṛthagavayavadhyānavarṇanaṁ ca
\|**

**\|\| 3.28.1 \|\|**

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca---**

**yogasya lakṣaṇaṁ vakṣye sabījasya nṛpātmaje \|**

**mano yenaiva vidhinā prasannaṁ yāti sat-patham \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

sa-bījo vaiṣṇavo yogo nirbījas tṛṇya-daivataḥ \|

> bījaṁ viṣṇur hi jagataḥ śākhādyāś cānya-devatāḥ \|\| iti kaurme
> \|\|1\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

aṣṭāviṁśe tato'ṣṭāṅga-yogena dhyāna-śobhinā \|

sarvopādhi-vinirmuktaṁ svarūpa-jñānam īryate \|\|

bhaktiṁ saṅkṣepataḥ procya sāṅkhyām ākhyāya vistṛtam \|

athāha vaiṣṇavaṁ yogam aṣṭāṅgaṁ kapilo hariḥ \|\|

sabījasya sālambanasya \| prasannaṁ sat \|\|1\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yenaiva vidhinā prakāreṇa
tat-prakārakaṁ lakṣaṇam ity anvayaḥ \|\|1\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

aṣṭasv aṅgeṣu yogasya dhyānaṁ vistārya varṇyate \|

aṣṭāviṁśe yato yogī muktiṁ vinded ayatnataḥ \|\|

sva-bhaktim upadiśyaivaṁ sāṅkhyām uktvā tad-anvitam \|

aṣṭāṅga-yogaṁ tan-miśram ārebhe vaktum iśarīraḥ \|\|

sabījasya sālambanasya \|\|1\|\|

**\|\| 3.28.2-7 \|\|**

**sva-dharmācaraṇaṁ śaktyā vidharmāc ca nivartanam \|**

**daivāl labdhena santoṣa ātmavic-caraṇārcanam \|\|**

**grāmya-dharma-nivṛttiś ca mokṣa-dharma-ratis tathā \|**

**mita-medhyādanaṁ śaśvad vivikta-kṣema-sevanam \|\|**

**ahiṁsā satyam asteyaṁ yāvad-artha-parigrahaḥ \|**

**brahmacaryaṁ tapaḥ śaucaṁ svādhyāyaḥ puruṣārcanam \|\|**

**maunaṁ sad-āsana-jayaḥ sthairyaṁ prāṇa-jayaḥ śanaiḥ \|**

**pratyāhāraś cendriyāṇāṁ viṣayān manasā hṛdi \|\|**

**sva-dhiṣṇyānām eka-deśe manasā prāṇa-dhāraṇam \|**

**vaikuṇṭha-līlābhidhyānaṁ samādhānaṁ tathātmanaḥ \|\|**

**etair anyaiś ca pathibhir mano duṣṭam asat-patham \|**

**buddhyā yuñjīta śanakair jita-prāṇo hy atandritaḥ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** samādhir aprayatnena manasaḥ
saṁsthitir bhavet iti ca \|\|7\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tatra yama-niyamān āha tribhir
akṣara-dvayādhikaiḥ \| śaktyā sva-dharmācaraṇam \| grāmyas traivargiko
dharmaḥ, tasmān nivṛttiḥ \| mitaṁ ca tan medhyaṁ śuddhaṁ ca tasyādanam
\| tatra mitaṁ nāma---

> dvau bhāgau pūrayed annais toyenaikaṁ prapūrayet \|
>
> mārutasya pracārārthaṁ caturtham avaśeṣayet \|\| iti smṛti-prasiddham
> \|

viviktaṁ vijanaṁ kṣemaṁ nirbādhaṁ tasya sthānasya sevanam \| yāvatārthaḥ
prayojanaṁ tāvan mātrasya parigrahaḥ \| āsanādīny aṅgāny āha tribhiḥ \|
sata āsanasya jayena sthairyam \| sva-dhiṣṇyānāṁ prāṇa-sthānānāṁ
mūlādhārādīnāṁ madhye ekasmin deśe manasā saha prāṇasya dhāraṇaṁ dhāraṇā
\| ātmano manasaḥ samādhānam ātmākāratā \| anyaiś ca vrata-dānādibhiḥ \|
pathibhir upāyaiḥ \|\|2-7\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam**.***

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tatra yama-niyamān āha
tribhir akṣara-dvayādhikaiḥ \| tatrāhiṁsā
satyāsteyāparigraha-brahmacarya-maunāni yamāḥ \| tad-anyāni
sva-dharmācaraṇādīni niyamāḥ \| grāmyas traivargiko dharmaḥ \|
mita-medhyādanam iti tatra mitaṁ nāma---

> dvau bhāgau pūrayed annais toyenaikaṁ prapūrayet \|
>
> mārutasya pracārārthaṁ caturtham avaśeṣayet \|\| iti smṛti-prasiddham
> \|

viviktaṁ nirjanaṁ kṣemaṁ nirbhayaṁ ca yat sthānaṁ tatra sthitiḥ \|
yāvatā arthaḥ prayojanaṁ tāvan-mātrasya na tv adhikasya vastunaḥ
parigrahaḥ \| āsanādīny aṅgāny āha tribhiḥ \| sata āsanasya jayena
sthairyam \| sva-dhiṣṇyānāṁ prāṇa-sthānānāṁ mūlādhārādīnāṁ madhye
ekasmin deśe manasā saha prāṇasya dhāraṇaṁ dhāraṇā \| ātmano manasaḥ
samādhānaṁ samādhir ātmākāratā \| anyaiś ca vrata-dānādibhiḥ \|
pathibhir upāyaiḥ yuñjīta dhyāne yojayet \|\|2-7\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.28.8 \|\|**

**śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya vijitāsana āsanam \|**

**tasmin svasti samāsīna ṛju-kāyaḥ samabhyaset \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** āsanādīni prapañcayati---śucāv
iti yāvat samāpti \| āsanaṁ kuśājina-cailottaraṁ pratiṣṭhāpya \|
svastikāsanena yathā-sukham iti vā \| samabhyaset prāṇam iti śeṣaḥ \|

> ūrū jaṅghāntar ādhāya pādāgre jānu-madhyage \|
>
> yogino yad avasthānaṁ svastikaṁ tad vidur budhāḥ \|\| iti \|\|8\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** svastikam āsīna ity atra tu
yathā-sukham iti na saṅgacchate svasti-samāsīna iti
sambandhokti-sammataḥ \| atra tu svastikāsanenety api saṅgacchate
samānārthatvāt \| svastika-śabdasya tatraiva niruktir iti bhāvaḥ \| su
śobhanam asti sthitir yatreti vyākhyāne tu yathā-sukham iti vyākhyāne'pi
svastikam iti ghaṭate \|\|8\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** āsanādīni vivṛṇoti \|
āsanaṁ kuśājina-cailottaraṁ, tasmin svastikaṁ svasty eva yathā syāt evam
āsīnaḥ \| yad vā svastikāsanopaviṣṭa ity arthaḥ \| yathā ca---

> ūrū jaṅghāntar ādhāya pādāgre jānu-madhyage \|
>
> yogino yad avasthānaṁ svastikaṁ tad vidur budhāḥ \|\| iti \|\|8\|\|

samabhyaset prāṇam iti śeṣaḥ \|\|8\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.28.9 \|\|**

**prāṇasya śodhayen mārgaṁ pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ \|**

**pratikūlena vā cittaṁ yathā sthiram acañcalam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bāhya-vāyor antaḥ praveśanaṁ
pūrakaḥ, praveśitasya dhāraṇaṁ kumbhakaḥ, dhṛtasya bahir niḥsāraṇaṁ
recakaḥ \| pratikūlena vā recaka-kumbhaka-pūrakaiḥ \| yad vā, iḍayā
pūrya piṅgalayā recanam, piṅgalayā pūrya iḍayā recanam ity evaṁ
pratikūlena \| vā-śabdaś cārthe \| sthiraṁ sat punar api cañcalaṁ yathā
na bhavati tathā śodhayet \|\|9\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

dakṣiṇayā nāsayā recanaṁ recakaḥ \| pratikūlena recaka-kumbhaka-pūrakaiḥ
asthiram api cittaṁ yathācañcalaṁ syāt \|\|9\|\|

\|\|13\|\|

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

navāṅga-bhaktāv api yaṁ tṛtīyam

dhyānaṁ hareḥ saptamatām agāt tad

aṣṭāṅga-yogo'tra ca mokṣa-siddhyai \|\|

prasaṅgato bhaktānāṁ yogināṁ ca dhyeyaṁ svarūpam āha---prasanneti \|
śaṅkhety atra caturthaṁ padmam api draṣṭavyam \| bhrājat-kaustubhena
tadīya-svarṇa-sūtreṇa āmuktā pratibaddhā ruddhā kandharā grīvā yasya tam
\| mattānāṁ dvirephāṇāṁ kalo madhuro dhvanir yasyāṁ tayā \| parārdhyaṁ
parārdha-mūlya-krītam \| kāñcī-sūtreṇollasantī śroṇiḥ kaṭir yasya tam \|
bhaktānāṁ hṛdayāmbhojam eva viṣṭaram āsanaṁ yasya tam \| śāstram anugram
\| apīvyam atisundaram \| kaiśore pañcadaśa-varṣe vayasi nitya-sthitam
\| kīrtanārhaṁ tīrtha-rūpaṁ ca yaśo yasya tam \|\|13-18\|\|

\| āsīnaṁ ratna-siṁhāsane govardhana-śṛṅge ca \| śayānaṁ śeṣa-paryaṅke
govardhana-guhāyāṁ ca \| śuddha-bhāvaṁ cetas tadā tena prekṣaṇīyaṁ
jāla-randhrād bahiḥ sthitvaiva draṣṭum arham īhitaṁ krīḍā ceṣṭitaṁ yasya

**\|\| 3.28.20 \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tad evaṁ samagra-dhyānam
uktvaikaikāvayava-dhyānam āha---**tasmin** **labdhaṁ padaṁ** sthitir
yena tac **cittaṁ** **vilakṣya**, viśeṣeṇa lakṣī-kṛtya \| **ekatra**
ekaikasminn aṅga ity arthaḥ \|\|20\|\|

1.22\] \| tatra mṛdv-adhimātram āha---**viṣṇu-rūpa**- iti \|
hasitasyāvadhitvaṁ prakāśa-mātratvena nirākāra-sannikṛṣṭatvāt \| sthūlam
āha---**tasminn** iti \| **tasmin** viṣṇu-rūpe **padaṁ** sthairyaṁ
**vilakṣya ekaikam aṅgaṁ** vivekena lakṣīkṛtya **sañcintayed** iti \|
**cakravālaṁ** maṇḍalaṁ, **mahato** dhyātur **hṛdayam** \|\|20-21\|\|
\[mu.pha. 2.13-14\]

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : vilakṣya** niścitya \|\|20\|\|

ekaikāvayava-dhyānam āha---**tasmin** bhagavad-vigrahe \|\|20\|\|

**\|\| 3.28.21 \|\|**

**sañcintayed bhagavataś caraṇāravindaṁ**

**vajrāṅkuśa-dhvaja-saroruha-lāñchanāḍhyam \|**

**uttuṅga-rakta-vilasan-nakha-cakravāla-**

**jyotsnābhir āhata-mahad-dhṛdayāndhakāram \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tad eva pādādi-krameṇāha
trayodaśabhiḥ \| **samyak cintayet** \| pāda-tale rekhātmakāni vajrādīni
**lāñchanāni**, taiḥ **āḍhyaṁ** yuktam \| uttuṅgāś ca raktāś ca
vilasanto nakhās teṣāṁ cakravālaṁ maṇḍalaṁ tasya jyotsnābhir āhato
**mahatāṁ** dhyātṝṇāṁ **hṛdayāndha-kāro** yena \| etac ca sarvam
upādeya-viśeṣaṇaṁ dhyeyatvenaivocyate \|\|21\|\|

**kaivalya-dīpikā**: *pūrva-ślokaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ.*

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : mahatāṁ** dhyātṝṇāṁ **hṛdayasya**
**andha-kāram** asāmarthyam \|\|21\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**
pādādi-krameṇaikaikāvayava-dhyānam āha---**vajra-** iti \|
dakṣiṇa-caraṇa-tala-dhyānaṁ tasyaiva kalpa-taru-mūle tiṣṭhatas
tribhaṅga-lalitasya kṛṣṇasya bhaktair dṛśyatvāt tasya dakṣiṇa-caraṇasya
kaniṣṭhā-tale'**ṅkuśaṁ** dhyāyet \| aṅkuśa-tale **vajram,** anāmikā-tale
**saroruhaṁ,** saroruha-tale **dhvajam** \| evam aṅguṣṭha-tale
yava-cakrādikaṁ jñeyam \| etair **lāñchanaiś** cihnair **āḍhyam** \|
**andhakāraṁ** pāpam \|\|21\|\|

\...

**\|\| 3.28.22 \|\|**

**yac-chauca-niḥsṛta-sarit-pravarodakena**

**tīrthena mūrdhny adhikṛtena śivaḥ śivo'bhūt \|**

**dhyātur manaḥ-śamala-śaila-nisṛṣṭa-vajraṁ**

**dhyāyec ciraṁ bhagavataś caraṇāravindam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ ca, yasya **śaucena**
kṣālanena **niḥsṛtāyāḥ** **sarit-pravarāyā** gaṅgāyā **udakena**
**tīrthena** saṁsāra-tārakeṇa **mūrdhny adhikṛtena** dhṛtena **śivo'pi
śivo'bhūt**, atyadhikaṁ sukhaṁ prāpety arthaḥ \| dhyātur **manasi yaḥ
śamala-śailaḥ** pāpa-parvatas tasmin **nisṛṣṭaṁ** ksiptaṁ **vajram** iva
yat \| yad vā, śamala-śaile nisṛṣṭaṁ sva-lāñchana-rūpaṁ vajraṁ yena tat
\|\|22\|\|

**------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**

**kaivalya-dīpikā**: dakṣiṇam aṅghriṁ dhyātvā gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṁ vāmaṁ
dhyāyet ity āha---**yac chauca-** iti \| **sarit-pravarā** gaṅgā \|
**tīrthaṁ** tārakam \| **adhikṛtena** svābhāvikike śivatve
nimittotprekṣā **śiva** iti \| tasyāś cevādim antareṇāpy upalambhāt
tad-aprayogaḥ \| **śamalaṁ** pāpam \| **nisṛṣṭaṁ** prahitam \|\|22\|\|
\[mu.pha. 2.15\]
